wins.title: Zero build warnings/errors across entire stack
wins.impact: Clean compilation with 0 backend warnings/errors and only 3 pre-existing TypeScript errors (from Epic 4, unrelated to Epic 5 work). New code introduced zero new build issues.

wins.title: All Epic 4 quality gates implemented and effective
wins.impact: All 10 P0/P1 actions from Epic 4 retro were APPLIED before Epic 5 began. Three experiments (E-007 FluentValidation, E-008 ESLint exhaustive-deps, E-009 P0/P1 blocking) all PASSED validation with zero related findings.

wins.title: Fast story completion with low fix cycle rate
wins.impact: 2 stories (16 ACs) delivered in 41 minutes with only 50% fix cycle rate (1 of 2 stories needed fixes). Story 5.2 achieved clean approval with zero Critical/Important findings.

wins.title: Strong test discipline maintained
wins.impact: 26 new tests added (17 backend, 9 frontend). All frontend tests passing (311 tests, 0 failures). Fix for IMPORTANT-1 included missing tests, demonstrating test-first commitment.

wins.title: Consistent anti-pattern tracking shows clean implementation
wins.impact: Zero new anti-patterns identified across both stories. Previous Epic 4 anti-pattern prevention mechanisms effective.

problems.title: Backend tests not executable without .NET 10 runtime
problems.impact: 17 new backend tests added but not executed. Demo completely blocked (0/16 ACs verified). Docker Compose exists but was not used as fallback verification method.
problems.root_cause: Missing runtime dependency on development host. No automated fallback to containerized verification.

problems.title: Code coverage measurement still not operational
problems.impact: Despite Epic 4 action A-002 (Code coverage CI with thresholds) marked APPLIED, section 3 shows 'Code Coverage: Not measured'. Cannot verify coverage thresholds or track coverage trends.
problems.root_cause: Disconnect between action status (APPLIED) and actual operational status (Not measured). Implementation may be incomplete or infrastructure-dependent.

problems.title: ESLint results not captured in retro evidence
problems.impact: ESLint enforcement mentioned in Epic 4 actions (A-006 exhaustive-deps as error) but no ESLint execution results in Epic 5 quality signals. Cannot verify E-008 experiment with primary signal.
problems.root_cause: Evidence collection process may not run ESLint or capture output.

problems.title: Pre-existing TypeScript errors not addressed
problems.impact: 3 TypeScript errors in Epic 4 screening feature (unused variables) persist through Epic 5. Low severity but represents accumulating tech debt.
problems.root_cause: No cleanup policy for pre-existing errors. Errors accepted as 'pre-existing' without remediation plan.

problems.title: CandidateList.tsx complexity growing (474 lines)
problems.impact: File exceeded 300-line threshold before Epic 5 and grew by +32 lines. Identified as 'CandidateRow subcomponent extraction candidate' but no action taken.
problems.root_cause: Reactive detection without proactive refactoring trigger. Missing refactoring gate when adding to already-large files.

missing_evidence.description: Backend test execution results (pass/fail counts, duration)
missing_evidence.impact: Cannot verify 17 new backend tests actually pass or measure backend test health trends
missing_evidence.proposed_instrumentation: Add Docker-based test execution fallback when .NET runtime unavailable, or document skip rationale explicitly

missing_evidence.description: Code coverage percentages (overall, delta for Epic 5)
missing_evidence.impact: Cannot validate Epic 4 action A-002 effectiveness or detect coverage regressions
missing_evidence.proposed_instrumentation: Verify coverage CI is running and exporting results to retro evidence bundle; if blocked by .NET runtime, use Docker

missing_evidence.impact: Cannot directly validate E-008 experiment (exhaustive-deps enforcement) or detect new violations
missing_evidence.proposed_instrumentation: Add ESLint execution to evidence collection script with structured output (JSON or summary)

missing_evidence.description: File size distribution or lines-per-file trend tracking
missing_evidence.impact: Reactively detecting complexity hotspots (CandidateList.tsx) rather than proactively monitoring trends
missing_evidence.proposed_instrumentation: Add file size histogram to evidence bundle; flag files >300 lines growing by >10%

candidate_actions.title: Implement containerized test execution fallback
candidate_actions.rationale: Backend tests and demo completely blocked without .NET 10 runtime. Docker Compose infrastructure exists but unused. Zero verification of 17 new tests or 16 ACs is unacceptable for delivery confidence.
candidate_actions.success_criteria: Next epic retro shows backend test execution results (pass/fail/count) even when host lacks .NET runtime. Demo walkthrough uses Docker Compose when host runtime unavailable.

candidate_actions.title: Audit and fix code coverage CI implementation
candidate_actions.rationale: Epic 4 action A-002 marked APPLIED but coverage still 'Not measured' in Epic 5. Indicates incomplete implementation or missing dependency. Coverage thresholds cannot be enforced if not measured.
candidate_actions.success_criteria: Next epic retro evidence bundle includes coverage percentages (overall + delta). Coverage CI job runs and reports results. Document any blockers preventing measurement.

candidate_actions.title: Add ESLint execution to retro evidence collection
candidate_actions.rationale: ESLint results not captured despite A-006 enforcement rule. Cannot validate E-008 experiment or detect new violations systematically.
candidate_actions.success_criteria: Next epic retro section 3 includes ESLint execution summary (files checked, rules triggered, pass/fail). Structured output (JSON or table format).

candidate_actions.title: Establish pre-existing error cleanup policy
candidate_actions.rationale: 3 TypeScript errors from Epic 4 persist. No process to address pre-existing errors prevents accumulation. Small errors today, larger refactoring blockers tomorrow.
candidate_actions.success_criteria: Document policy: pre-existing errors either (1) fixed within N epics, (2) added to tech debt backlog with timeline, or (3) suppressed with justification. Apply to 3 screening feature errors.

candidate_actions.title: Add file size growth gate for large files
candidate_actions.rationale: CandidateList.tsx at 474 lines (+32 this epic) is complexity hotspot. Identified as refactoring candidate but no trigger to act before growth continues.
candidate_actions.success_criteria: CI check or pre-commit hook flags files >300 lines growing by >10% or >50 lines. Require refactoring plan or explicit deferral justification. Apply to CandidateList.tsx as test case.
